sentences.en: Always aim for achievement and forget about success. - --- Helen Hayes.
sentences.cn: 永远要争取做出成就,别多考虑成功. ---- 海伦海丝.

sentences.en: Denis Hayes , then a Harvard law student, was Earth Day's national coordinator.
sentences.cn: 哈佛大学法学院学生丹尼斯?海耶斯, 当年是世界地球日的协调员.

sentences.en: Everyone but Hayes and Yao looked lost out there.
sentences.cn: 除了姚明和海爷,每个人都不在状态.

sentences.en: First Rockets are as follows: Alstom, Wo Fu, Artest, Hayes, and Yao Ming.
sentences.cn: 火箭队首发名单如下: 阿尔斯通 、 沃弗 、 阿泰斯特 、 海耶斯 、 姚明.

sentences.en: Good to see Hayes put in some quality minutes.
sentences.cn: 非常高兴海耶斯打得比赛质量很高.

sentences.en: Hayes and the conductor seated next to him , Dale Getter, watched her, horrified.
sentences.cn: 海斯和坐在身旁的车长戴尔·格特看着她, 吓坏了.

sentences.en: Hayes needs to just be able to stay in games.
sentences.cn: 海耶斯必须学会如何能使自己留在场上.

sentences.en: I think Chuck Hayes did a great job too!
sentences.cn: 我觉得海耶斯也干的不错.

sentences.en: Mom and Dad, this is Tom Hayes.
sentences.cn: 妈妈和爸爸, 这是汤姆?海斯.

sentences.en: Mr. Hayes : Let's stick to the subject we're discussing, please.
sentences.cn: 海斯先生: 请回到我们在讨论的主题.

sentences.en: Mr. Hayes: And now everyone knows that. Bill, what do you think about the meetings?
sentences.cn: 海斯先生: 现在每个人都知道了. 比尔, 你对午餐会议的看法 如何 ?

sentences.en: Or do you think that I am like this Lisa Hayes?
sentences.cn: 还是你以为我会像丽莎—海因斯那样?

sentences.en: Royal-watcher Mary Hayes said: "It looks like it is going to be an unhappy time for the Queen."
sentences.cn: 皇室观察员玛丽·海斯说：“看来女王接下来的日子不太好过。”

sentences.en: Thank you Rafer, Hayes and thank you refs.
sentences.cn: 谢谢拉夫, 海耶斯,也谢谢你们这些裁判.

sentences.en: The Rockets still are counting on Luis Scola , but Hayes does things that are always useful.
sentences.cn: 火箭现在指望着斯科拉, 但海耶斯是很实用的.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 查克海耶斯（美国篮球明星）

trans.tran_cn: 美国著名的通讯器材生产商，贺氏公司
